My Favorite Restaurants.Name: Sarma
My Favorite Restaurants.Notes: I've only been once, but wow. Everything was so good. If you ever find yourself in Greater Boston, you've gotta have Sarma's cornbread.

My Favorite Restaurants.Name: The Helmand
My Favorite Restaurants.Notes: The best (and only?) Afghan restaurant around Boston. Fun fact: The owner's brother is Hamid Karzai, former President of Afghanistan.

My Favorite Restaurants.Name: Dar Poeta
My Favorite Restaurants.Notes: It would be foolish to claim after one visit to Rome that I know where the best pizza is. I don't care. Dar Poeta is the correct answer.

My Favorite Restaurants.Name: NIDO's BackYard
My Favorite Restaurants.Notes: Showing some love to my new home. NIDO's is the best Mexican restaurant I've found in the Bay Area so far. Great tacos and better vibes.

My Favorite Restaurants.Notes: Just learned from Google it's permanently closed :(
